title: Magnetism Unit Conversions – tesla, gauss, oersted, A/m, weber

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Flux density (B): 1 T = 10,000 G, 1 mT = 0.001 T = 10 G Field strength (H): 1 Oe = 1000/(4π) A/m ≈ 79.5774715 A/m Flux (Φ): 1 Wb = 10⁸ Mx
